issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: This is introduced in HIVE-14690. However, only check-set block needs to be synchronized, not the whole block. The method will start Tez AM, which is a long operation. Make the method synchronized will serialize session start thus slow down hs2.
fields.summary: SessionState.start don't have to be synchronized

comments.body: Thanks for the suggestion. Patch updated.
